caption: I wanted to try everything for myself at least once before making a judgment call on it. Sometimes, these adventures led me to discover great perspectives I never would have had on my own. And other times, they went horribly wrong.Looking back, I had mistakenly assumed that embracing any and all experiences made me progressive and enlightened. After all, if people were talking about the good that they experienced with drugs, was there perhaps some truth to it that was worth exploring?I realise now that my position to even consider exploring the good in something as damaging as drugs was a result of how the harsh realities of drug abuse managed to evade me through my privilege.Dont get me wrongI still think its so important to stay receptive to different perspectives without bias, but open-mindedness is nothing without its most crucial component: critical discernment.In collaboration with .drugfreesg
